title: Login success with valid credentials
description: Verify that users can successfully log in using valid credentials and are redirected to the dashboard.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter valid username/email
Enter valid password
Click login button
Verify login is successful and dashboard is displayed

title: Login failure with invalid credentials
description: Verify that login fails with incorrect credentials and an appropriate error message is shown.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter invalid username/email
Enter invalid password
Click login button
Verify login fails and error message is displayed

title: RBAC enforcement on restricted modules
description: Verify that users with different roles have access only to permitted modules and features according to RBAC policies.

steps.description: Login as a user with limited role (e.g., receptionist)
Attempt to access admin panel and financial management modules
Verify access is blocked or restricted, with appropriate notifications

title: Dashboard KPI data update and empty data handling
description: Verify that KPIs and graphs on the dashboard update in real-time and gracefully handle cases with no data.

steps.description: Login as authorized user with valid data in system
Verify dashboard KPIs and graph visualizations display up-to-date data
Clear all data used for KPIs (simulate or use test data)
Verify dashboard shows appropriate messages or empty states without UI breaking

title: Appointment creation with conflict validation
description: Verify that the system allows creating appointments and prevents double-booking conflicts with validations.

steps.description: Login and navigate to the appointment calendar
Create an appointment for a specific date/time slot
Verify that the appointment is successfully created and displayed
Attempt to create another appointment overlapping the same date/time and resource
Verify that the system prevents the conflicting appointment and shows a validation error

title: Appointment drag & drop rescheduling
description: Verify that appointments can be rescheduled by dragging and dropping in the calendar without creating conflicts.

steps.description: Navigate to the appointment calendar with existing appointments
Drag an existing appointment to a new valid time slot
Verify that the appointment time is updated and no conflicts occur
Attempt to drag and drop the appointment into a conflicting slot
Verify the system rejects the move with an error or warning

title: Patient registration with valid data
description: Verify that a new patient can be registered successfully with all mandatory fields and the record appears in search.

steps.description: Navigate to the patient management page
Enter all required patient details with valid data
Submit the patient registration form
Verify the patient is added and visible in patient list and can be searched accurately

title: Patient search by multiple fields
description: Verify that patient search returns correct results for queries by name, ID, phone number, and other searchable fields.

steps.description: Navigate to patient management page
Enter patient name in search box
Verify relevant patients matching the name appear instantly
Search by patient ID and phone number separately
Verify search results correspond exactly to query

title: Patient record update and deactivation
description: Verify that patient records can be updated correctly and patients can be deactivated preventing further scheduling.

steps.description: Select an existing patient in the system
Modify editable patient fields and save
Verify updates reflect properly in patient details view
Deactivate the selected patient
Verify patient is marked inactive and excluded from active scheduling

title: Medical attention guided flow with required fields validation
description: Verify that the medical attention UI enforces step-by-step guidance and blocks progression if required clinical data is missing.

steps.description: Open medical attention form for a patient
Attempt to proceed to next steps without filling mandatory fields (e.g., SOAP notes)
Verify progression is blocked and user receives validation errors
Complete all mandatory fields with valid data
Verify the form progresses and clinical record is saved

title: Financial transaction recording and filter accuracy
description: Verify that financial transactions including payments and receipts are recorded properly and filters work by date, patient, status, and amount.

steps.description: Navigate to financial management page
Record a new payment linked to a patient and appointment
Verify transaction is saved and displays with correct details
Apply filters by date range, patient, and payment status
Verify displayed transactions correspond exactly to filter criteria

title: Invoice and receipt generation and verification
description: Verify that invoices and receipts can be generated for payments and display correctly with all required information.

steps.description: Select a completed payment in billing module
Generate invoice and/or receipt document
Verify document contains correct patient, treatment, and payment information

title: Inventory management CRUD
description: Verify that products and materials can be created, updated, deleted and that inventory levels reflect changes correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to inventory management page
Add new inventory item with full details
Verify item is listed with correct attributes
Update inventory item information and save
Verify updates are reflected in the inventory list
Delete an inventory item
Verify item is removed from the inventory list

title: Staff role assignment and availability management
description: Verify admin users can manage staff roles, assign permissions, and define work schedules accurately.

steps.description: Login as administrator and navigate to staff management
Add or update staff roles and permissions
Verify role changes are saved and affect user access accordingly
Set staff availability and working hours
Verify availability is correctly stored and used in scheduling

title: Real-time notifications functionality
description: Verify that system delivers real-time notifications for relevant events via websocket and UI components update accordingly.

steps.description: Trigger an event that generates a notification (e.g., new appointment, patient update)
Verify notification is received in real-time and displayed in notifications panel

title: Responsive UI on multiple device sizes
description: Verify that all UI screens and components render and remain usable on different viewport sizes: desktop, tablet, and mobile.

steps.description: Access the system on a desktop resolution
Verify layout and components render correctly and are fully functional
Resize or use device emulator to view on tablet and mobile sizes
Verify UI adapts responsively with no broken elements or lost functionality

title: Password change with validation and success notification
description: Verify users can change their password by providing current password, new password and that validations and success/error messages behave correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to profile settings
Attempt to change password with incorrect current password
Verify an error message is shown indicating invalid current password
Change password with valid current password and compliant new password
Verify password change is successful and confirmation message is shown

title: Error handling for network failures
description: Verify that when network requests fail (e.g., due to server down), the UI shows user-friendly error messages without crashing.

steps.description: Simulate network failure during data fetch (e.g., dashboard KPIs)
Verify error message is shown and UI retains usable state
Simulate network failure during form submission (e.g., patient registration)
Verify form shows appropriate error and retry options

title: Reports generation and export validation
description: Verify that reports can be generated based on selected filters and data, and can be exported in supported formats.

steps.description: Navigate to reports section
Select report type and apply filters (date ranges, staff, treatment types)
Generate report
Verify report data matches filter criteria and renders correctly
Export report as PDF and CSV formats
Verify exported files are generated correctly and downloadable

title: Voice assistant command integration test
description: Verify the voice integration receives commands, executes supported actions and handles unsupported commands gracefully.

steps.description: Activate voice assistant and issue a supported command (e.g., schedule appointment)
Verify the command is processed and UI responds accordingly
Issue an unsupported or invalid command
Verify the system responds with a helpful error or prompt
